Site Required:#167 The Womb of the Earth
Destination Terrain : Cave
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
An Agarthan Oracle ventures down to the Womb of the Earth and gazes into the reflections of the First Pool to gain knowledge of subterranean sources of magic. The spell reveals all magic sites of earth, fire, water and death in a distant cave province.
